name: Carbon Fever
description:
Earth is currently undergoing very
drastic changes due to climate
change, technological developments,
and human behavior. One of the
causes is carbon gas, carbon
emissions can cause major impacts
such as uncertain climate change
which can lead to flooding, resulting in
economic instability. In addition, if
allowed to continue, carbon emissions
can also cause air temperatures to
increase and cause global warming.
So let's save our earth from carbon
gas fever.
